tweets.text: As this week is Flood Action Week, so thought we‚Äôd share this handy checklist produced by the Environment Agency explaining how being prepared for the worst can make a crisis a lot easier to handle. @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyYNE https://t.co/65c5SE00wW
We have an @EnvAgencyYNE  #flood recovery page for #SouthYorkshire. Check out the latest here https://t.co/SSmIETYql4

The Leeds FAS natural flood management team are featured in the first edition of the Current Innovation Supplement! Find out how they‚Äôre using innovative data techniques to inform programme delivery #data #nfm #innovation @EnvAgencyYNE https://t.co/JKKkMFgKpM

We are working with @WYFRS & @YorkshireWater at the Bradford fire site by removing contaminated fire-fighting water which has collected there in pools.
 
Pumps will be used to direct the water into the sewer and away from nearby becks. https://t.co/zNI1QlLU1x

As part of the #Kendal Flood Risk Management Scheme environmental surveys have been undertaken. 

#TeamEA are protecting a variety of different species inc otters, white-clawed crayfish, bats and kingfishers.

For more info, visit ‚û°Ô∏èhttps://t.co/XTYr7iH1wB

A UK first! A fantastic evening. 5 Flood Actions Groups Farmers, CaBA reps and FRMs came together to form The Corvedale Flood Catchment Partnership. Great Success. @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @ShropCouncil @NFUtweets @Dunne4Ludlow @stwater @cardiffuni @WildlifeTrusts @CaBAtweets https://t.co/DCTS7PFVQB

@eabroken2020 @WasteCrimeWatch @EnvAgency I was a regulator a kind while ago. We were taught that the point of the exercise was to help people act correctly, not to hassle them or worse still prosecute. Those outcomes were to be restricted to serial offenders who had no intention of complying. Accordingly, we advised..
@howardthebear @WasteCrimeWatch @EnvAgency The officers I dealt with said they don‚Äôt give advice as they are a regulatory body only.  They lie.
@eabroken2020 @WasteCrimeWatch @EnvAgency Yes, a degree of focus might be helpful. Continually changing the rules and guidance will not help if they aren't enforced anyway....
@rumena_aktar @LeanLeft_Wright @FirsBromford @cbhallgardens @Diane4HodgeHill @HHOpenDoor @WorthBS @WTBBC @BhamTrees4Life @FirsPrimary @FirozaTPO @Colebourne It is a flood defence scheme @EnvAgency

@graphic_results @EnvAgencyMids I get asked this question a lot. Because the level of the river is controlled by the weir, removal of silt in the impoundment by the river gardens would make no difference to flood risk. In addition, the amount of silt is self governing and does not increase from year to year.

We are heading towards sustainable development goals and conservation but these large companies like @Flipkart @amazonIN @amazon @myntra are making litter all around non biodegradable waste such as plastic packaging etc. Please stop use of plastic material https://t.co/zz47bSTwck
